body:
Hi,
I just updated to the latest develop and now `spack load` is not working anymore.
I installed gcc again and when I try loading I get this error

```
  ModuleCmd_Load.c(208):ERROR:105: Unable to locate a modulefile for 'gcc-6.1.0-gcc-4.2.1-w2fahnzqgqife5lbbmsbtxnv24umogh4'
```

Also `spack compiler find` is broken but that is mentioned in another bug report as well.
title: spack load broken
